amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that prohibits funds appropriated in the bill from being used to pay for abortions except when the life of the mother is endangered.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment 12 in the Congressional Record of July 16, 1996 to delete the provisions in the bill that prohibit funds appropriated in the bill to pay for abortions except when the life of the mother is endangered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
